name: wilson-associates-foreclosure-scraper
title: Wilson Associates Foreclosure Scraper
description: Scrapes foreclosure auction data from Wilson Associates website

dateRangeBegin.title: Date Range Begin
dateRangeBegin.description: Start date for sale search (YYYY-MM-DD format). If not provided, uses today's date.

dateRangeEnd.title: Date Range End
dateRangeEnd.description: End date for sale search (YYYY-MM-DD format). If not provided, uses today + 30 days.

state.title: State
state.description: State to search for sales (default: TN)
